modName: Chillrend - How it should have been.
summary: A simple aesthetic improvement for a slightly neglected sword.
descriptionHtml:
Its nothing special or terribly complicated. A mesh and texture replacement based on vanilla resources.
Just download, click and drag. You know the drill.

Compatible with all mods except, well, unless they replace Chillrend's texture or mesh. Duh.
Overwrite if necessary. Blah blah blah.

I enjoyed the final product so I thought I'd share! :)

Suggestions and ideas are welcome.
And if you enjoy it, I'd appreciate screenshots! mIne aren't the "best".
author: SuperDuperPooperScooper
